name: Nextrans Vietnam
description:
Nextrans is the most active Korean Venture Capital in Asia. Our mission is to create a global network of talented and passionate founders in the pursuit of world-changing impact. We want to transform the lives of the human race by leveraging state-of-the-art technology and empowering disruptive startups on timeless philosophy “Trust, Sharing and Passion”.

Nextrans has supported more than 100 startups around the world since 2004 and started investment in Vietnam startups from 2015 with progressive expansion in our portfolio.
